name: D. Gellyfish and Camellia Japonica
statement:
Gellyfish has an array of n integers c_1, c_2,
ldots, c_n. In the beginning, c = [a_1, a_2,
ldots, a_n].Gellyfish will make q modifications to c.For i = 1,2,
ldots,q, Gellyfish is given three integers x_i, y_i, and z_i between 1
and n. Then Gellyfish will set c_{z_i} :=
min(c_{x_i}, c_{y_i}).After the q modifications, c = [b_1, b_2,
ldots, b_n].Now Flower knows the value of b and the value of the
integers x_i, y_i, and z_i for all 1
leq i
leq q, but she doesn’t know the value of a.Flower wants to find any
possible value of the array a or report that no such a exists.If there
are multiple possible values of the array a, you may output any of them.
